items.sentence: I hope that I have enough money to buy everything that we need.
Which do you want to hear first, the good news or the bad news?
I can stop at the supermarket on my way home if you need me to.
The only reason that Tom did that was because he was forced to.
The weather improved considerably during the course of the day.
Mary gave all the dresses she'd outgrown to her younger sister.
I don't think that it'll be possible to get this ink stain out.
I hope that Tom serves time for the crimes that he's committed.
Tom wanted to buy Mary something, but he didn't have any money.
I spent three years in prison for a crime that I didn't commit.
